help.short: The name of the public IP address.

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ipTags" options="ip-tags" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.zones" options="zone z" group="">

help.short: The DDoS custom policy associated with the public IP.
The DDoS protection policy customizability of the public IP. Only standard coverage will have the ability to be customized.
The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP. This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone.
A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
The provisioning state of the PublicIP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.
The resource GUID property of the public IP resource.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="ipTags" arg="$parameters.properties.ipTags">
<prop type="array" name="zones" arg="$parameters.zones">

command.name: update

help.short: The DDoS custom policy associated with the public IP.
The DDoS protection policy customizability of the public IP. Only standard coverage will have the ability to be customized.
The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP. This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone.

command.argGroup:
<help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.zones" options="zones z" hide="True" group="Parameters">

help.short: The IP address associated with the public IP address resource.
The provisioning state of the PublicIP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.
The resource GUID property of the public IP resource.
